```{r}
ELA_data <- read_csv("Johnson Elementary ELA Project.csv", skip = 3)

ELA_data <- drop_na(ELA_data)

                  separate(`Tardies; Absences`, into = c('Tardies', 'Absences'), convert = TRUE)
```
